name: Working out
desc: Running can significantly improve physical and mental health. Running can reduce stress, improve heart health, and even help alleviate symptoms of depression.

name: Meditation
desc: The mental health benefits of meditation include better focus and concentration, improved self-awareness, lower levels of stress and anxiety.

name: Indoor bike
desc: Riding a stationary exercise bike is an efficient and effective way to burn calories and body fat while strengthening your heart, lungs, and muscles.

name: Yoga
desc: Yoga combines breathing exercises, meditation and poses proven to benefit mental and physical health.
